001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.util;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.AbstractRecursionPreventingNodeItemVisitor;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyNodeItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDefinitionNodeItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFieldNodeItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFlagNodeItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItemFactory;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IAllowedValuesConstraint;
021
022import java.util.Collection;
023import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
024import java.util.LinkedList;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Map;
027
028import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
029
030public class AllowedValueCollectingNodeItemVisitor
031    extends AbstractRecursionPreventingNodeItemVisitor<DynamicContext, Void> {
032
033  private final Map<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>, NodeItemRecord> nodeItemAnalysis = new LinkedHashMap<>();
034
035  public Collection<NodeItemRecord> getAllowedValueLocations() {
036    return nodeItemAnalysis.values();
037  }
038
039  public void visit(@NonNull IModule module) {
040    DynamicContext context = new DynamicContext(
041        StaticContext.builder()
042            .defaultModelNamespace(module.getXmlNamespace())
043            .build());
044    context.disablePredicateEvaluation();
045
046    visitMetaschema(INodeItemFactory.instance().newModuleNodeItem(module), context);
047  }
048
049  private void handleAllowedValuesAtLocation(@NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> itemLocation, DynamicContext context) {
050    itemLocation.getDefinition().getAllowedValuesConstraints().stream()
051        .forEachOrdered(allowedValues -> {
052          String metapath = allowedValues.getTarget();
053
054          MetapathExpression path = MetapathExpression.compile(metapath, context.getStaticContext());
055          ISequence<?> result = path.evaluate(itemLocation, context);
056          result.stream().forEachOrdered(target -> {
057            handleAllowedValues(allowedValues, itemLocation, (IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>) target);
058          });
059        });
060  }
061
062  private void handleAllowedValues(
063      @NonNull IAllowedValuesConstraint allowedValues,
064      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> location,
065      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> target) {
066    NodeItemRecord itemRecord = nodeItemAnalysis.get(target);
067    if (itemRecord == null) {
068      itemRecord = new NodeItemRecord(target);
069      nodeItemAnalysis.put(target, itemRecord);
070    }
071
072    AllowedValuesRecord allowedValuesRecord = new AllowedValuesRecord(allowedValues, location, target);
073    itemRecord.addAllowedValues(allowedValuesRecord);
074  }
075
076  @Override
077  public Void visitFlag(IFlagNodeItem item, DynamicContext context) {
078    handleAllowedValuesAtLocation(item, context);
079    return super.visitFlag(item, context);
080  }
081
082  @Override
083  public Void visitField(IFieldNodeItem item, DynamicContext context) {
084    handleAllowedValuesAtLocation(item, context);
085    return super.visitField(item, context);
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  public Void visitAssembly(IAssemblyNodeItem item, DynamicContext context) {
090    handleAllowedValuesAtLocation(item, context);
091
092    return super.visitAssembly(item, context);
093  }
094
095  @Override
096  public Void visitAssembly(IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem item, DynamicContext context) {
097    return visitAssembly((IAssemblyNodeItem) item, context);
098  }
099
100  @Override
101  protected Void defaultResult() {
102    return null;
103  }
104
105  public static final class NodeItemRecord {
106    @NonNull
107    private final IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> item;
108    @NonNull
109    private final List<AllowedValuesRecord> allowedValues = new LinkedList<>();
110
111    private NodeItemRecord(@NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> item) {
112      this.item = item;
113    }
114
115    @NonNull
116    public IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> getItem() {
117      return item;
118    }
119
120    public List<AllowedValuesRecord> getAllowedValues() {
121      return allowedValues;
122    }
123
124    public void addAllowedValues(@NonNull AllowedValuesRecord record) {
125      this.allowedValues.add(record);
126    }
127  }
128
129  public static final class AllowedValuesRecord {
130    @NonNull
131    private final IAllowedValuesConstraint allowedValues;
132    @NonNull
133    private final IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> location;
134    @NonNull
135    private final IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> target;
136
137    public AllowedValuesRecord(
138        @NonNull IAllowedValuesConstraint allowedValues,
139        @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> location,
140        @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> target) {
141      this.allowedValues = allowedValues;
142      this.location = location;
143      this.target = target;
144    }
145
146    public IAllowedValuesConstraint getAllowedValues() {
147      return allowedValues;
148    }
149
150    public IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> getLocation() {
151      return location;
152    }
153
154    public IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> getTarget() {
155      return target;
156    }
157  }
158}
